metadata.name: The Invisible Kimono Lady
metadata.description:
"The Kimono Lady" is part of "The Invisible Ladies" collection. It's a collection of 2 fan-arts that I made for the Invisible Friends NFT project, to cheer for its international community with talented & caring people from different countries across the globe.

I've integrated the beautiful symbols of Japan in "The Kimono Lady", can you see it (*)? I hope you enjoy the art <3

All proceeds for this collection will go to a charity organization/association chosen by the winning bidder.

(*)Hint: it's a flag ;)
